front.title: Segment Routing Header Extensions for DetNet Data Fields

abstract.t: The DetNet data fields defined in Deterministic Latency Action (DLA) can be used in enhanced Deterministic Networking (DetNet) to provide QoS treatment to achieve deterministic latency. This document defines how DetNet data fields are encapsulated as part of the Segment Routing with IPv6 data plane (SRv6) header.
